text: Anthony Mwamba (8 August 1960 - 21 January 2021) was a Zambian boxer. He competed in the men's light welterweight event at the 1988 Summer Olympics. Mwamba won a bronze medal in the welterweight (67 kg) division at the 1990 Commonwealth Games. Mwamba died on 21 January 2021 from COVID-19 in Lusaka, aged 60. ==References== Category:1960 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Zambia Category:Olympians for Zambia Category:Boxers
title: Anthony Mwamba
